languages.text: Лорд-капитан приказывает подать пергамент и перо. {mf|Он|Она} наскоро опрашивает офицеров, обрисовывает ситуацию на корабле, записывает данные и производит расчеты всевозможных исходов. Через десять минут офицеры начинают покидать медпалубу, каждый — с пергаментом, исписанным четкими указаниями.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан приказывает подать пергамент и перо. {mf|Он|Она} обрисовывает ситуацию на корабле, записывает данные и производит расчеты всевозможных исходов. Через десять минут офицеры покидают медпалубу с полным пониманием, как действовать в любой сложившейся ситуации.

languages.text: The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment with specific instructions.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан приказывает подать пергамент и перо. {mf|Он|Она} наскоро опрашивает офицеров, обрисовывает ситуацию на корабле, записывает данные и производит расчеты всевозможных исходов. Через десять минут офицеры начинают покидать медпалубу, каждый — с пергаментом, исписанным четкими указаниями.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment covered in specific instructions.

The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment with specific instructions.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} pide pergamino y pluma. Tras preguntar a los oficiales por varios asuntos, evalúa la situación de a bordo, anota los datos y calcula los posibles resultados. Al cabo de diez minutos, los oficiales empiezan a abandonar la cubierta médica, cada uno con sus instrucciones en un pergamino.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment with specific instructions.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} pide pergamino y pluma. Tras preguntar a los oficiales por varios asuntos, evalúa la situación de a bordo, anota los datos y calcula los posibles resultados. Al cabo de diez minutos, los oficiales empiezan a abandonar la cubierta médica, cada uno con sus instrucciones en un pergamino.

languages.text: 领主舰长要了几张羊皮纸与一支羽毛笔。{mf|他|她}简要地向军官问了些问题，总结了船上的情况，将数据写在纸上，并计算了可能带来的结果。十分钟之后，军官们离开了医疗甲板，每个人都拿着一张写着具体指示的羊皮纸。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment with specific instructions.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长要了几张羊皮纸与一支羽毛笔。{mf|他|她}简要地向军官问了些问题，总结了船上的情况，将数据写在纸上，并计算了可能带来的结果。十分钟之后，军官们离开了医疗甲板，每个人都拿着一张写着具体指示的羊皮纸。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは、羊皮紙と羽根ペンが欲しいと頼む。士官に簡単な質問をして船内の状況をザッとまとめ、データを書き留めると、起こり得る可能性を計算する。10分後、士官達はそれぞれ具体的な指示が書かれた羊皮紙を持ってメディケアデッキを後にした。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment with specific instructions.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは、羊皮紙と羽根ペンが欲しいと頼む。士官に簡単な質問をして船内の状況をザッとまとめ、データを書き留めると、起こり得る可能性を計算する。10分後、士官達はそれぞれ具体的な指示が書かれた羊皮紙を持ってメディケアデッキを後にした。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain verlangt Pergament und einen Federkiel. Er befragt kurz die Offiziere, schildert die Situation auf dem Schiff, notiert die Daten und berechnet die möglichen Folgen. Nach zehn Minuten verlassen die Offiziere das Medicae-Deck. Jeder trägt ein Stück Pergament mit spezifischen Anweisungen bei sich.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment with specific instructions.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} demande du parchemin et une plume. {mf|Il|Elle} interroge brièvement les officiers, dresse un compte rendu rapide de la situation à bord du vaisseau, note les données importantes et calcule les issues possibles. Au bout de dix minutes, les officiers commencent à quitter le pont medicae, chacun muni d'un parchemin portant des instructions spécifiques.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment with specific instructions.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} demande du parchemin et une plume. {mf|Il|Elle} interroge brièvement les officiers, dresse un compte rendu rapide de la situation à bord du vaisseau, note les données importantes et calcule les issues possibles. Au bout de dix minutes, les officiers commencent à quitter le pont medicae, chacun muni d'un parchemin portant des instructions spécifiques.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan birkaç parşömen ile bir kalem istiyor. Subayları kısaca sorguluyor, gemideki durumu ana hatlarıyla çıkarıyor, verileri yazıyor ve olası sonuçları hesaplıyor. On dakika sonra subaylar, ellerinde özel talimatlar yazılı parşömenler ile sıhhiye güvertesinden ayrılmaya başlıyor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain demands some parchment and a quill. {mf|He|She} briefly questions the officers, outlines the situation on the ship, writes down the data, and calculates possible outcomes. After ten minutes, the officers start to leave the medicae deck, each one carrying a piece of parchment with specific instructions.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan birkaç parşömen ile bir kalem istiyor. Subayları kısaca sorguluyor, gemideki durumu ana hatlarıyla çıkarıyor, verileri yazıyor ve olası sonuçları hesaplıyor. Subaylar, on dakika sonra, ellerinde özel talimatlar yazılı parşömenler ile sıhhiye güvertesinden ayrılmaya başlıyor.
